descriptionOfStep:
# ** _ Step 4 _ **
 ## Git Commit
Once the file has been added to the staging area, it must be committed to the repository.
To do this, use the command:
`` `bash
 git commit -m "<commit message>"
`` ``
Thanks to this command, the time / date, the author and the message about the commit will be recorded.

[! NOTE]
> \
Only changes added to the training area will be committed,
> any files in the working directory that were not prepared will not be included.

**_A task_**
======
Using this command commit the file from the previous steps.
